pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Chebyshev Interpolation // Contains methods for creating multivariate Chebyshev interpolations of functions on a hypercube. If available through fftw3, the DCT-II/FFT is used to compute the coefficients, so it is reasonably fast. Some interpolation methods for multivariate non-Chebyshev grids are also provided, as well as polyharmonic splines with a linear term.
